name: Jazzpunk: Flavour Nexus
detailed_description: Flavour Scientists have been working tirelessly to uncover the Long Lost Tastebud! Somewhere in the human tongue exists a flavour no man, realplicant, or wombat has ever experienced! As Deep-Fried Agent Polyblank, you'll sizzle onto the scene, scarfing every clue, gadget, and classified document you can get your moistened mandibles around!  The Flavour Nexus Beckons you! But has our Dear Agent Polyblank bitten off more than is physically chew-able? Tune-in, and Tuna-on!
about_the_game: Flavour Scientists have been working tirelessly to uncover the Long Lost Tastebud! Somewhere in the human tongue exists a flavour no man, realplicant, or wombat has ever experienced! pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2 or higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X v10.6 Snow Leopard or higher
  • Processor: 2 GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 or higher
  • Processor: 2GHz Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video card with 512MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
